description: Best WhatsApp bot developed by Ibrahim Adams

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for your bot

AUTO_REJECT_CALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

ANTICALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reject calls

AUTO_BIO.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto update bio

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your status will be read automatically (type yes to activate or no to deactivate)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Status will be sent to your inbox automatically (type yes to activate or no to deactivate)

AUTO_READ.description: Messages will be marked as read automatically (type yes to activate or no to deactivate)

BOT_IMAGE.description: Image URL for your bot menu

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Type yes for public mode or no for private mode

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Enter your Heroku API key to be able to control your vars

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter your Heroku app name to be able to control vars

STATUS_REACT_EMOJIS.description: Enter your auto like status emojis

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto like status

ANTIDELETE_SENT_INBOX.description: Enable anti-delete to be sent inbox (yes/no)

ANTIDELETE_RECOVER_CONVENTION.description: Enable anti-delete deleted to recover in conversation (yes/no)
